author: wadalliance
title: Influencing Policy for Adoption
description: 政府和政策制定者对区块链技术的使用案例缺乏了解，导致国家采用的摩擦。

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal wants to organise 2 large events in 2 African nations aimed specifically at policy makers in those nations. Getting the local authorities to get to know this blockchain, and blockchain as a whole for that matter, could sway the sentiment towards a positive cooperation. Resulting in more adoption and more community influx.
f6_assessments.q1: WADA is a well known team within the Project Catalyst ecosystem and already has a network of local community centers in place to facilitate this project expansion. Their main project is thriving on the African continent and they keep expanding on this regulalry.  The budget has been allocated realistically and potential risks have been taken into consideration.
f6_assessments.q2: Very clear KPIs have been put into place as variables along with a roadmap, budget breakdown and risk assessment. The proposal has been assembled correctly in terms of auditability. One suggestion for improvement could be to link the WADA-website in the proposal so the reader can grasp a better general idea of how this would fit in the main project.

f6_assessments.q0: Great reading this proposal. It is well-drafted and focuses on engaging government officials which is great for influencing policies. I think it would be great to segment the stakeholders into sub-groups like regulatory officials, legislators, etc and target them differently. In all, this is a great way to gain entry into the public policy space. Awesome idea.
f6_assessments.q1: Great team experience and the team has a track record of delivering great projects as well. The plan is specific, practical, and measurable. The follow-up component on stakeholders is great and participatory as it offers them the opportunity to join and influence policies together with the team. The outcomes are measurable and I think the community should support in making this a reality.
f6_assessments.q2: The team is transparent and open. There is a great auditable process involved in the proposal. I like the budget breakdown as well.  It would be easy to track and monitor success.

solution: 在两个非洲国家组织两次高调活动，展示Cardano的使用和采用的好处，并让政策制定者加入当地的Cardano中心。
